metadata.title: CVE-2018-8763 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Roland Gruber Softwareentwicklung LDAP Account Manager before 6.3 has XSSvia the dn parameter to the templates/3rdParty/pla/htdocs/cmd.php URI orthe template parameter to thetemplates/3rdParty/pla/htdocs/cmd.php?cmd=rename_form URI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8763` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-account-manager - 6.3-1
ldap-account-manager-lamdaemon - 6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ldap-account-manager package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3-1').
